title: Sean Penn's Daughter Dylan Talks Relationship with Madonna: 'I Think He Just Really Admires Her Work'
text: Sean Penn flashes a smile as he attends a special screening of Paladin’s India’s Daughter held at The Paley Center for Media on Tuesday (October 20) in Beverly Hills, Calif. The 55-year-old actor was joined at the event by director and writer of the documentary Leslee Udwin and executive producer Lorna Auerbach. PHOTOS: Check out [...] »
